name: Drone Infiltrator
description: U.S. military is training more drone pilots than jet fighters. Attack drones have become a safer way to protect your country. Now, you have the unique opportunity to fly with one of the most amazing lifelike technologies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 7 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 – 4590 equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE VR headset and hand controllers
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 10 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i7 – 6800 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon Pro Duo DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE VR headset and hand controllers
